content: for too long i ve selected the crochet hook size so that the potholder is firm and ready to be use with hot things if you want a more drapey potholder then use a larger crochet hook if you re using a different yarn and you think it might be used to hold hot things then stay away from yarns with acrylic / polyester / synthetics as they may go funny when they come in contact with something
